column4: there is a command/prog to go from iso to img, also  but yes unetbootin very handy
thank you, is there something like unetbootin for macs? i downloaded the amd64 iso on os X
very well might be...let me check for you see if i can help you out
thanks again, really looking forward to getting this working
look at this link and scroll down to option 4.  it does say you need an img file   http://www.webupd8.org/2009/04/4-ways-to-create-bootable-live-usb.html
thanks, it turns out the mac program hdiutil will convert to an .img from an .iso
